settings.text:
247 Gym Equipment is an Australian-owned and operated business, founded in 2020 to provide premium home and commercial gym equipment at affordable prices. We partner with trusted manufacturers that meet our high standards, ensuring durability, performance, and value.

Our wide range of strength training equipment, weightlifting gear, power racks, squat racks, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, weight plates, benches, cardio machines, functional fitness equipment, and gym flooring caters to beginners, fitness enthusiasts, and professional athletes.

We are committed to making fitness accessible without compromising on quality or performance, delivering heavy-duty, commercial-grade, and space-saving gym solutions across Australia.
